metadata.title: CVE-2022-26847 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
SPIP before 3.2.14 and 4.x before 4.0.5 allows unauthenticated access to information about editorial objects.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-26847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.2.11-3+deb11u3build0.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.11-3+deb11u3build0.21.10.1').
